title: Oma's Cheesecake Cookies
markdown:
### Summary

Nathan,

Every year since I met your Oma Dianne I have been obsessed with her cheesecake cookies. They are my favorite thing on Christmas morning. Oma Dianne started making for any important gathering because she knew I would be so happy to have them. I hope that they bring you joy and if they don’t then please make them with love for others.I love you dearly.

Mom

### Ingredients (crust)

* ¼ cup butter
* ⅓ cup firmly packed brown sugar
* 1 cup flour
* ½ cup chopped pecans
* ¼ cup currant jelly
### Ingredients (filling) 

* 1 8oz package cream cheese
* 1 egg
* ¼ cup sugar
* 2 Tbs milk
* 2 Tbs lemon juice
* ½ tsp vanilla extract
### Preparation

* Preheat oven at 350
* For the crust: 
* Cream butter, brown sugar and flour in blender
* Stir in pecans (reserve ½ c of this mixture for the topping)
* Press remainder into bottom of and 8 in square baking pan
* Bake at 350 degrees for 15 min
* Cool, and when cooled spread with jelly
* For the filling:
* Cream the cream cheese and sugar
* Beat in egg and milk
* Slowly add in lemon juice and vanilla extract
* Pour over bott and sprinkle with the reserved topping mixture
* Bake for 30 min
* Cool and cut
